text: phwk khea(thi mi xxk pi sngkhram ta bu k)ca kætaw kæ phwk than meux phwk than klab mayang phwk khea cng klaw theid(muhammad) wa phwk than xya kætaw ley rea ca mi cheux phwk than dxk thæ cring xallxh thrng cæng khawkhraw khxng phwk than kæ rea læw læa xallxh nan thrng hen kark ra tha khxng phwk than læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh k hen dwy læw phwk than k ca thuk na lab pi yang phra phuthrng rxbru hæng sing renlab læa sing peidphey læw phraxngkh k ca thrng cæng kæ phwk than hı ru thung sing thi phwk than kratha nan
